titleStmt.title: The generall signes and fore-runners of Christs comming to iudgment Soundly and sincerely collected out of Holy Scripture, and seruing as well to awaken the drowsie and careless worldling, as to comfort and reuiue the godly and afflicted Christian.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by M[iles] F[lesher] and are to be sold by H. Gosson, at his shop on London-bridge,

notesStmt.note: Running title reads: The signes and fore-runners of Christs comming to iudgment.
Identified as STC 14549a on UMI microfilm.
Reproduction of the original in the Bodleian Library.
